response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Considering its true worth, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that is valued at $10,000, but tailored to your specific requirements at a more favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with this remarkable product. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
